features.featureTitle: Replace the existing Safran header logo asset with the user-provided image, keeping the public path unchanged: `/assets/generated/safran-logo.dim_220x64.png` (as used by `frontend/src/components/layout/AppShell.tsx`). The resulting image must be a clean, properly cropped/scaled logo that fits within 220x64 and renders clearly on both light and dark backgrounds (transparent background if possible).
